Over the course of the stream we will hear from open source hardware creators from around the world who will come and tell us about how they engage with openness.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"From perfume makers, to PCB enthusiasts, to bacterial dyes, there’s so many ways that hardware can present and we will be getting a peak into how all these wonderful creators use them. The stream will feature over 70 guests who have committed to openness in so many incredible ways. ","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Be sure to join the stream, meet other open source creators, and get a membership to help support the work that OSHWA does!","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"You can also always ","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"hyperlink","data":{"uri":"https://application.oshwa.org/"},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"certify your work","marks":[{"type":"underline"}],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"text","value":" as the perfect way to celebrate OHM! ","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}
